title.rendered: Digital Marketing Courses in South Delhi To Kick-Start Your Career

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]Are you thinking of kick-starting your career? Or looking for the best career options to start your career all over again in Delhi. If yes, then you are here at the right time, as in this article I will get you through the list of the best digital marketing courses in south Delhi that will help you to provide the best digital marketing training with expert knowledge in all various modules of online marketing. So, as you are already aware of the fact that with the advancement of technology and the up-gradation of various tools  & software the way people use the Internet has also changed. According to Internetlivestats, as of  January 2021, there were over 4.66 billion active internet users worldwide with 92.6 percent accessing the internet via mobile devices where most of the people use the Internet for online shopping, online banking, advertising, eCommerce business, social networking, etc. From the above-given stats, we can clearly see that with the increase in the number of Internet users, the demand for an online business or say companies performing the way to advertise their products or services would also increase with time. Therefore, it is the right time for you to avail yourself of the benefits to start your career in the field of online marketing as it will help you start with your own business or you can build your own successful career in online marketing, especially in the location of Delhi like South Delhi. Even though, if you are a family business entrepreneur, owner of SMEs, Startup owner, professional, or any other individuals, you can easily start with the learning of digital marketing courses in south Delhi with the help of expert knowledge & getting hands-on experience by working on the multiple projects. Now that you have made up your mind to learn online marketing from south Delhi, you might also have to look into the top job opportunities that you can get after you have completed your digital marketing courses. So, to help you out; I am here to provide you with a list of Various Job Opportunities in Digital Marketing. Also in case, if you live in any other part of Delhi, you can also easily check the Digital Marketing Institute in Delhi.  

Get Enrolled  For Best Digital Marketing Institute in South Delhi!

Want Kick-Start Career in Digital Marketing in Delhi?

Book Free Career Counselling 
SUBMIT DETAILS
JOIN TODAY
We respect your privacy.
Powered by ConvertPlugâ¢

 

Various Digital Marketing Job opportunities in South Delhi

 

1. Digital Marketing Manager

The very first job opportunity that you can get as a digital marketing professional, is to become a digital marketing manager in one of the reputed companies or the MNC where you will have the responsibility to strategize and implement the complete digital marketing campaign strategy of an organization to build a strong brand reputation and promote the various products and services to get in front of the targeted audience. Besides this, you will be also responsible for leading the entire marketing team and reporting to the head of marketing or VP of digital marketing of the company. Therefore, to become a digital marketing manager, you should have experience of more than 5+ years in the same industry to back up your expertise as a digital marketer. Digital Marketing Manager Jobs in South Delhi  If you are passionate enough about digital marketing, then you can easily work as a Digital Marketing Manager. 

2. SEO Expert

Once you have completed the digital marketing course, you can easily apply for the job role as a Search Engine Optimization Expert. Here, you will have the responsibility to rank the website on the Search Engine Resulting Page. Not only you will be responsible for ranking the website on the top of SERPs, but also be responsible for analyzing, reviewing, and optimizing the website using the various SEO techniques based on the latest trends and news on the different search engines like Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc.
SEO Expert job in South Delhi

3. Social Media Marking

As a Social Media Marketer, you will have the responsibility of handling the various social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Youtube, and Pinterest, etc of the company to design & execute the complete social media strategy of the company. Also, you will have the opportunity of creating content, including text posts, video, and images for promoting the company products, services, and content over various social media platforms and measuring some of the key metrics like reach, impressions, and engagement of the customers and convert them into the actual customers.
SMM Expert job in South Delhi

4. Content Marketer

In the digital marketing industry, content is king. As a content marketer of a company, you will be responsible for creating the content for a Company blog where it can be in the form of articles, videos, email newsletters, social media, etc. The main aim that you will have as a content marketer will be to create valuable content and distribute it among the various relevant channels to attract the targeted audience as well as to increase the website traffic. Also, you will have to work on various tasks like managing a blog, creating various campaigns, copywriting, guest blogging, PR, and video creation.
Content Marketing Job in South Delhi
 

PPC Expert

As a PPC Expert, you will be responsible for handling the paid ads of the various platforms like search engines, social media platforms to attract customers and increase the brand awareness of the company with the help of ads running on various platforms. With this, the job role of the PPC Expert will also be to plan, create and manage the PPC campaigns across a variety of platforms, do proper keyword research  & management skills to optimize the bids at the keyword, placement, device, geographic, demographic, etc including the monitoring, evaluation, and presenting the performance of campaigns. By generating the weekly or monthly reports to track the performance base on analyzing the trends, goals, opportunities, and other key performance indicators
PPC Expert job in South Delhi
Now, that you have gone through the various job opportunities in South Delhi. I think it is time for you to get into the list of the top best digital marketing courses in South Delhi. So, here is a list of top digital marketing courses you can check & get enrolled in south Delhi.  

Digital Marketing Courses in South Delhi

 

1. Digiperform

Being one of the most trusted & leading brands in the education sector, Digiperform now has trained over 24,000+ digital marketing professionals from all over India. In today’s scenario, when digital marketing has become the most essential skill for everyone, Digiperform with its well-structured curriculum designed in LMS provides its trainees with the learning of all the various modules in digital marketing that helps its trainees to become an expert in the field of Digital Marketing. Being in the industry for more than 9 years, Digiperform with its highly considerable placement cell has helped many of its trainees to start with their Digital Marketing careers. To feel enchanted, Digiperform has been featured in well known online magazines – Yourstory Media – has featured an article under the title “Edtech start-up Digiperform raises $ 3.6 M from HT Media” stating the recent achievements and how excited they are to make the most of the same investment to pick up the pace of growth in the market and build huge brand awareness in the market. With the change in the education sector, where most of the institutes and organizations are coming online to provide educational content to their customers and students, Digiperform has effectively launched its Online course for its students through which the students can easily learn and upgrade their digital marketing skills. Now let’s have a look over the advanced digital marketing course in Digiperform for the south Delhi location. Now let discuss the Digiperform Course Curriculum:

Course Types:

Digiperform Certified Online Marketing Professional Course (dCOMPro) Digiperform Certified Online Marketing Practitioner(dCOMP) Digiperform Certified Digital Marketing Planner (dCDMP)

Course Syllabus & Modules

Digiperform offers its Certified Online Marketing Professional Course with its 25+ Modules i.e
  • Marketing & Web Presence Foundation Module ( 5 Modules)
  • Online Business Visibility Creation (6 Modules )
  • Lead Generation (5 Modules)
  • Lead Nurturing (4 Modules)
  • Personal Branding & Online Earning (4 Modules)
  • Interview Preparation (1 Module)
  • 8 Masterclass
  • 3 Capstone Projects With 9 Specialization Badges

Course Highlights

  • 100% Job Assistance
In today’s world, when you can a lot of Competitive & everyone needs a secure job for their future. Digiperform is the only digital marketing institute that provides you with 100% job assistance to their trainees. So, while choosing the digital marketing course from Digiperform, you don’t have to worry about the job placement as they fulfill what they promise.
  • Tools based Learning
With the advancement of technology where every single thing is handled with the tools and software, Digiperform is the only training company that will enable you to get the experience to learn and handle 100+ live tools which are most commonly used by the marketing professionals and experts over the years.
  • Live Practical Sessions
To make you understand digital marketing more effectively. Digiperform provides you with live training sessions that will help you to understand the topic easily whenever required.
  • Industry’s Top Trainers
Learning digital marketing from the best industry experts is like a blessing, at Digiperform you will be get trained by the top industry professionals/trainers who will support you at every problem to achieve excellence in all parameters such as SEO, SMM, PPC, Social Media Marketing, Email Marketing, Google Ads and Affiliate Marketing, etc to meet your desired goals.
  • Free Doubt Session and Backup Classes
At Digiperform, you will get an opportunity to ask the right questions about marketing anytime in the doubt session, also with it in case if you have missed any of your classes Digiperform trainers will provide you with the backup class for the same.
  • Weekday/ Weekend/ Sunday Only Batch
Keeping in mind the busy schedule, Digiperform has provided its trainees with the special flexible time to provide training, where you can join the course according to your convenience and simultaneously engage with your business and other activities while taking the course.
  • PAN India Presence 
With the efficient growth of Digiperform, it has covered almost every city across Asia with the major aim to provide the knowledge of digital marketing to every individual. To date, it has almost 40+ centers making its presence all over India.
  • Award-Winning LMS 
To help its trainees learn digital marketing, it provides you with the best curriculum, certification, and 24*7 LMS designed for its trainees where you will easily get the course PPT’s, recording quizzes, self- half tutorials, and forums available only to the registered students for getting answers to all queries related to marketing.
  • Affordable Fees Structure 
It provides you with the fee structure that you can easily afford as compared to that of its competitors. Whether you are an Under-graduates, graduate, working professional, freelancer, housewife, and entrepreneur, you can easily afford the price for the course given to you at Digiperform to make a winning career.
  • High Quality of Training 
All the training modules provided to you at Digiperform are highly concerned about the quality where you will get the various training modules provided you are by the industry experts to make sure that it meets all major industry standards. Also, you will always get the latest skills and new technologies in the digital marketing industry.
  • Makes you an expert in the Digital domain
Once you have completed the digital marketing course from Digiperform, you will be able to apply for the job in big organizations and reputed ad agencies. Also, the major benefit that you will get after completing the course is that you will be able to choose multiple areas of digital marketing as per your skills and interest. Who can do this Course? 
  • Student & Jobseeker
If you are a student and looking forward to starting your career, pursuing the digital marketing course will be the best option for you as it will help you get the job in the various details with a high salary package.
  • Marketing Sales and Professionals
With the help of a digital marketing professional course, you will be easily able to upskill yourself for a better salary and career opportunities in the various digital marketing modules like SEO, SMM, Online Advertising, Google Analytics, Sales Optimization & Online Earning.
  • Business Owners and Entrepreneurs 
As a business owner and entrepreneur, with the help of digital marketing courses, you can grow your business and boost your revenue at a fast pace. Along with it, you can also target the most desired audience that you have set for your business.
  • Digital Marketing Professionals 
Although, if you are already a digital marketing individual with the help of a digital marketing course you can easily upgrade your existing skills and knowledge.
  • Housewives and Freelancers
If you are a homemaker to earn the extra income while sitting at home then enrolling in the digital marketing course will be the most advantageous step for you as here you can easily provide your digital marketing services to various clients from all around the world as well as you can also build your brand, earn as an affiliate marketer, make money with blogging, and start your own eCommerce business that will help you earn the huge income from home.

2. National School of Internet Marketing

Being one of the best institutes in South Delhi, the offers the most advanced digital marketing course for entrepreneurs and business owners where the training is specifically meant for providing each and every feature of digital marketing. The main aim of NSIM is to bring clarity on how to make a profit-making return to the business via digital marketing. The best thing about this course is that within a few months, you will easily be able to manage and take your business to the next level. Course Types: Advanced Digital Marketing Course Course Syllabus & Modules:
  • Fundamental of Digital Marketing
  • Website Planning & Website Creation
  • Content Writing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Google Analytics
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Online Reputation Management
  • Local Business Advertising
  • Ecommerce SEO and so on.
Course Highlights:
  • Internship with companies
  • Live Online Classes
  • Work with Top MNC Company
  • 100% Practical Course
  • Earn While You Learn
  • Lifetime job Support
  • Grow Your Startup Business Exponentially Using Digital Marketing
  • Online Reputation Management
 

3. Techstack Academy

Established in 2012, Techstack Academy (Reyedin Techstack Pvt. Ltd) is a Delhi-based training center that provides you with various courses to its students to upgrade their skills in a specific field. Being in the industry for more than 10 + years, it has also developed full-fledged courses into the other niche that provides you with quality training not only in digital marketing but also in Big Data Hadoop, Web Designing, and Development with quality training, smart classes, and 100% placement assistance. Course Type: Post Graduate Diploma in Digital Marketing course Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Initialization to Digital Marketing
  • Website Planning
  • Content Writing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Local SEO
  • Google Webmaster
  • Bing Webmaster
  • SMO (Social Media Optimization)
  • Google Analytics
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Email Marketing, etc.
Course Highlights
  • Redefined Career
  • 100% Job Placement Assistance
  • Business Increased Revenue
  • 17 Certification Guaranteed
 

4. Internet Marketing School

Internet Marketing school is the recent and growing digital marketing institute. However, it has established its name in one of the best digital marketing courses in south Delhi Founded in 2016 by the CEO of IMS Group, Mr. Sanjay Singhania, Internet Marketing School has become one of the leading hubs for providing the best industry-dominating digital marketers. The best thing that you can see about the Internet Marketing Institute is that they tend to provide both online & offline classes with their existing curriculum for freshers, jobseekers, working professionals, entrepreneurs, and business owners. The ISO & Google partner training institute has certified over 6000+ students and placed above 4000+ of its trainees. Though, it owns its own dedicated placement cell and esteemed industry association to take care of the placement. Digital Marketing Course Types: Hybrid Online and Offline classroom sessions with practical exposure. Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Website Planning & Development
  • Search Engine optimization
  • SEM (Google Ads)
  • Web Analytics
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Content Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • Inbound Marketing
  • Make Money Online
  • Mobile Marketing
  • E-commerce Marketing
  • Google Data Studio
Course Highlights
  • Backup Classes
  • 100% Placement Support
  • Small Batch Sizes
  • Live – Instructor Live Session
  • Get Secured with Certification
  • 24*7 Support from the Trainers
  • Easy EMI options
 

5. Digital Vidya

Founded in the year 2009 by Pradeep Chopra and Kapil Nakra, digital vidya is among the most dominant digital marketing training institute not only in India but also worldwide. Since the day it has been launched, it has trained over 38,000+ professionals from the brands like Nokia, Google, eBay, Reliance, Star TV, Cisco, Intel, ITC, and so on in more than 3,800 training batches conducted by Digita Vidya. Being the official training partner of Google & Microsoft India and has a partnership with Global Social Media giants like Facebook, LinkedIn, NASSCOM, and Vskills, it has an expert panel of over 70 trainers where each trainer is an expert in one specific niche skill i.e Search Engine Optimization, Search Engine Marketing, Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Inbound Marketing, E-commerce Marketing and etc. Course Types: Online & Offline Classroom Training Course Syllabus & Modules:
  • Search Engine optimization (4 Modules)
  • Search Engine Marketing (5 Modules)
  • Social Media Marketing (5 Modules)
  • Email Marketing (3 Modules)
  • Inbound Marketing (4 Modules)
  • Web Analytics (5 Modules)
  • Facebook Marketing (2 Modules)
  • Other Digital Marketing Topics (15 Modules)
Course Fee: INR 49,900 + Service tax Course Highlights:
  • Best Industry Trainers
  • Practical Sessions
  • Updated Digital Marketing Course Recording
  • Digital Marketing Course Lifetime Updates

6. Simply Digital

Simply digital is one of the best digital marketing in south Delhi. It was founded in April 2015, by professionals from the IIT & IIM’s, Simply Digital offers the most professional digital marketing course training in Delhi that has trained more than 3,000 professionals and helped them to grow their career and business. With the pace of aligned itself with the mission to bridge the gap between the workforce and the digital skills needed to fulfil the Digital India dream there, the main focus is on quality education, updated and customized courses, practical knowledge, learned an experienced faculty and our commitment to ensure the earning. Also, it is a google partner group company with google certified trainers who wants to share their knowledge with the other students and wants to see them learn and grow. Course Type: Full Curriculum Digital Marketing Course Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Overview of Digital Marketing
  • Website Planning & Content Creation
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • PPC Advertising & Google Adwords
  • Google Analytics
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • E-commerce Marketing
  • Video Marketing
  • Creating Internet Marketing Strategy and so on.
Course Highlights
  •  Industry experts have got excellent reviews
  • Customized short term and full-term courses
  •  The Complete 360-degree solution to all the digital marketing
 

7. Delhi Institute of Digital Marketing – (DIDM )

Delhi Institute of digital marketing is well established digital marketing coach. it has 12 years of experience in the field of digital marketing, Delhi institute is a renowned digital marketing company located in Delhi to fulfill the demand for digital marketing skilled professionals. Trained over 7,000 students and have been recognized by ASSOCHAM as the “Most Promising Brand”, DIDM commits to provide quality training with its advanced digital marketing courses and in-depth knowledge of digital marketing strategies to meet the growing demands of skilled individuals across the world. Course Types:
  • Master in Digital Marketing
  • Advanced in Digital Marketing
  • Professional in Digital Marketing
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Email Marketing
  • Google Adwords
  • Online Reputation Management
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Google Adsense
Course Highlights
  • Full Placement Support
  • Career Counselling
  • Interview Preparation
  • Free Tools and Software
  • One to One Industry Session
  • Online and Offline Assessments
 

8. Delhi Institute of Computer Courses(DICC)

Established in 2009, the Delhi Institute of Computer Courses provides you with the high – quality and career-oriented education with the main goal to provide standard, professional, and practical training to its students.   Trained more than 5000 students in the period of ten years, DICC is among the most reputed institute for providing the full stock market and other financial analysis courses, that will teach you everything practically and in live projects market hours. Also, they will teach you about the various techniques and strategies that will actually work in the market and provided you with handsome returns on investments. The course is designed in such a way that will be fruitful for both the investors and also for its students who are freshers and wants to make their career in the field of Digital Marketing. Once you have completed the course, you will easily be able to get a job or placements with complete assistance to get the job. Course Types:
  • DICC Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Overview of Digital Marketingeting
  • Basics of HTML
  • SEO On-page
  • SEO OFF Page
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Google Analytics
  • Mobile Marketing
  • Online Reputation Management
  • Video-Based Marketing and so on.
Course Highlights
  • International Certifications
  • Interactive Classroom Sessions
  • 12 + Years Experienced Traders
  • Live Project Training
  • Free Software and Tools
  • Maximum Doubt Clearing Sessions
  • Lifetime Support
 

9. High Technologies Solution India

Founded in 2000, by a group of highly qualified technocrats with proven expertise in varied technology domains, it provides you with a variety of services with their comprehensive training and online consultancy experience.   Although the HTS holds the distinction of being a unique group, it not only provides you with direct corporate services but also provides you with services on behalf of well-known organizations. Course Types: Best Digital Marketing Course Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Digital Marketing Overview
  • Domain Registration Web Design and Hosting
  • Keyword Research
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Content Marketing
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Online Reputation Management and etc.
Course Highlights
  • Google Certifed Trainers
  • 100% Practical Training
  • Free Website for One Year for Practical Training
  • Flexible Timings Available (Early Morning, Late Evenings)
  • 100% Placement Support
  • Affordable Fees
 

10. Digiinfotech

Being a professional training institute for advanced digital marketing programs & managed.   It is been managed by a team of certified working professionals of the digital marketing team where it provides you with the various digital marketing modules both in the forms of theory and practicals that will provide you with real-time exposure, guaranteed placement assistance, job trends, and interview scheduled once your training programs are finished. Course Types: Advance Digital Marketing Course Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Website Planning & Creation
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Google Ads – Pay Per Click
  • Online Display Advertising
  • Email Marketing
  • Google Console
Course Highlights
  • Practical Classes
  • Live Projects
  • 100% Practical Classes
  • 100% Job Assistance
  • Google Partner Institution
 

11. Digitalinventive

Digital Inventive is among one of the most outstanding Digital Marketing Institute in South Delhi that aims to prepare its students ready for a job role that will be in high demand. So by taking the right initiative, here you will get the incomparable digital marketing professional course that will help you have a secure job position with handsome salaries in the approaching future. Being the top institute, it has trained more than 1000+ candidates including freshers and numerous digital marketing professionals to have a strong career. Course Types: Digital Marketing Course Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Introduction to Digital Marketing
  • WordPress Management
  • Content Marketing
  • Google Ads
  • Lead Generation for Business
  • Google Analytics
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Marketing and many more
 

Conclusion

I hope the article about the digital marketing course has really helped you to get the most suitable course for you. You can easily choose the best institute for the best digital marketing courses in south Delhi from your choice. It will provide you with the benefits of learning all the modules of digital marketing effectively and efficiently. So, if you are living in Delhi and looking for the best digital marketing professional training courses in South Delhi, those mentioned above top Digital Marketing Courses in Delhi are the most promising ones.
